Author: traumabroccoli
Text: Yes and it can also be fatal. I was in treatment with a girl who wasnâ€™t even addicted to laxatives until getting out of treatment and trying to lose the weight fast. She was medically stable and almost at a healthy weight, three weeks later went into cardiac arrest after taking something like 20 dulcolax, which from what I read on here is rookie numbers to some..  Be careful.
